problem_name: Energy Efficiency Optimization in High-Performance Computing
description: Energy efficiency optimization in high-performance computing (HPC) focuses on minimizing energy consumption while maintaining performance levels. This is crucial for reducing operational costs and meeting regulatory requirements in data centers.

You are facing pressure to comply with energy efficiency regulations.
Your data center is looking to implement sustainable practices.
You experience thermal management issues due to high power usage.
You are looking for ways to optimize resource allocation in your HPC workloads.
